mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM NUM, PRODUCT.* FROM ( SELECT PC.PRODUCT_COMMENT_NO, PC.UNO, PC.PRODUCT_ID, PC.PRODUCT_COMMENT_REPORTNO, PC.PRODUCT_COMMENT_CONTENT, CASE WHEN PC.PRODUCT_COMMENT_GROUP = 0 THEN PC.PRODUCT_COMMENT_NO ELSE PC.PRODUCT_COMMENT_GROUP END AS PRODUCT_COMMENT_GROUP, PC.PRODUCT_COMMENT_BLINDSTATE, PC.PRODUCT_COMMENT_REGDATE, PC.PRODUCT_COMMENT_UPDATE, U.NICKNAME FROM PRODUCT_COMMENT PC JOIN USERINFO U ON PC.UNO = U.UNO WHERE PC.PRODUCT_ID=#{productId} ORDER BY CASE WHEN PC.PRODUCT_COMMENT_GROUP = 0 THEN PC.PRODUCT_COMMENT_NO ELSE PC.PRODUCT_COMMENT_GROUP END, PC.PRODUCT_COMMENT_NO ) PRODUCT ) WHERE NUM BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCT_COMMENT (PRODUCT_COMMENT_NO, PRODUCT_ID, UNO, PRODUCT_COMMENT_CONTENT, PRODUCT_COMMENT_GROUP, PRODUCT_COMMENT_UPDATE_UNO) VALUES (PRODUCT_COMMENT_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{productId}, #{uno}, #{productCommentContent}, #{productCommentGroup}, #{uno})
mapper.update: UPDATE PRODUCT_COMMENT SET PRODUCT_COMMENT_CONTENT = #{productCommentContent}, PRODUCT_COMMENT_UPDATE = SYSDATE, PRODUCT_COMMENT_UPDATE_UNO=#{uno} where PRODUCT_ID=#{productId} and UNO=#{uno}

UPDATE PRODUCT_COMMENT SET PRODUCT_COMMENT_BLINDSTATE = 2, PRODUCT_COMMENT_UPDATE= SYSDATE, PRODUCT_COMMENT_UPDATE_UNO = #{uno} WHERE PRODUCT_COMMENT_NO = #{productCommentNo} AND #{userStatus} = 1 AND PRODUCT_COMMENT_BLINDSTATE = 1
UPDATE PRODUCT_COMMENT SET PRODUCT_COMMENT_REPORTNO = PRODUCT_COMMENT_REPORTNO + 1 WHERE PRODUCT_ID = #{productId}
